net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Create Ext Database
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Execute this macro the first time Lib:O5e-MonsterSupplement is installed. The token it creates will be the Ext Databas and will co-exist alongside your other Token Libraries. While there are built-in backups in the token itself, the GM should also make file backups of the token in order to restore an inadvertent deletion.
